resources.string: This will truncate all your data!

To add new column to the table just enter its name and press Add by the input. 
To insert new entry to the table enter values by the columns and press Add in the ActionBar. 
To query results from the table enter some values you want to filter with and press Search in the ActionBar. 
To remove some column just swipe of the column. 
To remove an entry swipe of the item in the result set.
